leads.lead_text: Flowers 8–16 mm diam.; branches of mature tree not flexuose; leaf and pedicel remnants not forming distinct knobs
Flowers 3.5–7 mm diam.; branches of mature trees flexuose; leaf and pedicel remnants forming distinct knobs
